channel.title: I need some help with xeroscape
channel.description:
Well, I've read every thing I can, and I'm clueless. I have it downloaded, and I get this error "Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client Press any key to continue . . ."
Now, I haven't done anything with the files, and I have now idea how or where to download a cache. Please help.

item.title: I need some help with xeroscape
item.dc:creator: @scarscaper4life scarscaper4life
item.description:
@scarscaper4life wrote:

you need to download moparscape its on the main page then take the catche file out of that and put it in xero scape hope that helps

Read full topic
